name: gigglingly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If you do something gigglingly, you are giggling (= laughing quietly in an uncontrolled way) while you are doing it: He gigglingly admitted that it was all a huge mistake. They were rifling gigglingly through his things.
More examplesFewer examplesHe gigglingly gave his mother the details.The girls gigglingly agree, while their boyfriends look suspicious.His assistant gigglingly assured me of his total commitment.The musical director gigglingly invited us to applaud.The girls had filmed themselves meeting the band, and were now gigglingly replaying the video.They were drunk and gigglingly unsympathetic.
